author: Shadow_Crawler
title: Really, really, cute!
review: This set is nice! The reindeer is very cute-looking, and the hat is very good too. I like the way they design the feet and the hat, while the body is nice too. The hat have a good white point in the top. Nice set!

author: alva
title: Nice Scuplture
review:
I bought the set with a bargain, priced under USD 1. So, when I found them, I bought as many as available.

This set, standing alone, probably wont perceived as a good set. but try to place it with the newest set of Winter Toy Shop and Winter Toy Bakery, and they will complete each other, creating a very nice winter city, with this set serve as a snow sculpture, like a snowman.

The building process of the set is quite straightforward, and there are no special parts used here, but I think this set is truly capturing the classic spirit of Lego. Using bricks, regular bricks, to create something.
